alert.note: Alert for Bedford (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 4:11PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Bedford County through 500 PM EDT... At 410 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Huddleston to Westlake Corner. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. Very heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Localized minor flooding in poor drainage and low-lying areas. Locations impacted include... Moneta... Huddleston... Smith Mountain Lake State Park... and Westlake Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
